org.corfudb.recovery

Class FastSmrMapsLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.corfudb.recovery.FastSmrMapsLoader

  • public class FastSmrMapsLoader
extends Object
    The FastSmrMapsLoader reconstructs the coalesced state of SMRMaps through sequential log read This utility reads Log entries sequentially extracting the SMRUpdates from each entry and build the Maps as we go. In the presence of checkpoints, the checkpoint entries will be applied before the normal entries starting after the checkpoint start address. As current state, it doesn't support checkpoints/trim. Created by rmichoud on 6/14/17.
